trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around December 22nd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI took pictures of the same double rainbow as did MANY people. I hope they report too. Mine is not a report of a sighting but rather information to help pin point the sighting. I took 6 pictures with a first generation iPhone. 1,2 &3 were taken at the SE corner of Lankershim and Riverside, from 4:03 to 4:04 pm, looking N. There are no orbs. #4 is at 4:15 going east on Lankershim. not far fromthe above location. There are no orbs. #5 & 6 are heading S on US101 approaching the Universal Studios Blvd overpass at 4:18 pm. Again no orbs. I hope this is helpful.
